General.Name: Shanghai Milkground Food Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Milkground Food Tech Co., Ltd engages in the manufacture and sale of cheese and liquid milk products to consumers and industrial clients in China. The company's products include ready-to-eat nutrition series cheese sticks, shredded cheese sticks for adults, growth cups for children, daily smoking cheese, mozzarella cheese, cheese slices, cream cheese, butter, grilled cheese, and cheese sauce. Its liquid milk products include pasteurized milk, fermented milk, and room temperature liquid milk. The company sells its products through distributors, self-operated e-commerce, large shopping malls, and supermarkets. Shanghai Milkground Food Tech Co., Ltd was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
